item.title: My Homelab: Proxmox & Ansible Automation
item.description: I run a homelab environment to experiment with virtualization, automation, and IT infrastructure. My main hypervisor is Proxmox VE, which allows me to manage virtual machines and containers efficiently. I have been trying to improve my skills with Ansible and wanted to apply what I’ve learned in my homelab. This is also a good way to document things that I normally do when I create VMs like installing the QEMU agent and creating new users on them and it helps me to automate the process of creating new VMs and containers when I need them.
